methods.clearAndTransform:
Propagates changes from one ModifiedColumnSet to another ModifiedColumnSet that contextually
 represent different tables. Clears the output set prior to transforming.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.ModifiedColumnSet) - source table's columns that changed
:param output: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.ModifiedColumnSet) - result table's columns to propagate dirty columns to
methods.transform:
Propagates changes from input ModifiedColumnSet to output ModifiedColumnSet. Does not
 clear the output before propagating.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.ModifiedColumnSet) - source table's columns that changed (null implies no modified columns)
:param output: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.ModifiedColumnSet) - result table's columns to propagate dirty columns to
methods.transformLambda:
Do not invoke directly.

:param input: io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.ModifiedColumnSet
:param output: io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.ModifiedColumnSet

text: A helper utility that simplifies propagating modified columns to a child table.
